definition: dispute
old variant of 糾|纠[jiu1]
to gather together/to investigate/to entangle/to correct
numerous/confused/disorderly

sentences.english: Arbeloa and Pedro were involved in another incident.
sentences.chinese: 阿贝罗阿和佩德罗同样被卷入另一起纠纷。

sentences.english: He dreads the prospect of having to take any contract dispute to court.
sentences.chinese: 他害怕由于合同纠纷上法院。

sentences.english: UK employment law embodies arbitration and conciliation mechanisms for settling industrial disputes.
sentences.chinese: 英国雇佣法包括解决劳资纠纷的仲裁和调解机制。

sentences.english: If a lawsuit is filed due to disputes of torts , the people's court may accept it directly.
sentences.chinese: 因侵权纠纷起诉的，人民法院可以直接受理。

sentences.english: Secondly, we must expand our range of civil disputes actionable.
sentences.chinese: 第二，要扩展我国民事纠纷的可诉范围。

sentences.english: He is one of those people who always seem intent on stirring up trouble among his workmates.
sentences.chinese: 他是个有意要在工友之间挑起纠纷的那种人。

sentences.english: Pending settlement of the dispute over water, none of the parties may unilaterally alter the existing water regime.
sentences.chinese: 在水事纠纷解决前，当事人不得单方面改变现状。

sentences.english: What tendency will be shown in the reproduction of medical disputes?
sentences.chinese: 在再现医疗纠纷的过程中将表现出怎样的媒介倾向。

sentences.english: It undermines cohesion and creates dissension.
sentences.chinese: 这件事会破坏团结，制造纠纷。

sentences.english: She often serves as a peacemaker among her siblings.
sentences.chinese: 她经常为她的兄弟姐妹调解纠纷。

sentences.english: They were tangled in the labour-management controversy.
sentences.chinese: 他们被卷入了劳资纠纷。

sentences.english: Americans confronted with business disputes expect to turn to lawyers and courts.
sentences.chinese: 美国人遇到商业纠纷往往期望寻求律师和法院的帮助。

sentences.english: The real significance of judicial judgment lies in the provision of opinion on how to settle a dispute.
sentences.chinese: 司法裁判的本质在于提出解决纠纷的处理意见。

sentences.english: You know, expecially when he fell out.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，特别是当他起纠纷时。

sentences.english: Dilemma and Prospects of Non-litigation Settlement System of Forest Property Dispute …
sentences.chinese: 我国林权纠纷非诉解决机制的困境及其突破。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the common causes of medical tangle and death causes of the patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨医疗活动中引起纠纷的较常见原因及死因。

definition: lawsuit
common plea/civil appeal (as opposed to criminal case)
to mediate/to bring parties to an agreement
lawsuit/CL:場|场[chang2]
public courtroom accusation (idiom)/legal confrontation/to take sb to court/to sue
persons involved or implicated/party (to an affair)
arbitration
mass incident (PRC term for incidents of social unrest, including rioting, melees and petition campaigns)
to file a lawsuit/to sue/to dispute
civil case/agricultural affairs/civil
to ask for compensation/to claim damages/claim for damages
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
plaintiff and defendant/prosecution and defense (lawyers)
pendente lite/during litigation
lose a lawsuit
to sue/to bring a lawsuit against/to prosecute
